summary.para: Specifies values used by any sync engine to expose their internal engine states to the Property Store's PKEY_StorageProviderStatus value in the File Indexer

To update the property, first call with the flag. Next, call the IPropertyStore.SetValue method of the returned object, specifying the PKEY_StorageProviderStatus key, to set the property's bitmask value using these SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS.

member.name: SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS.SESF_SERVICE_QUOTA_NEARING_LIMIT
member.summary: The user's cloud storage quota is nearing capacity. This is dependent on the user's total quota space.

member.name: SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS.SESF_SERVICE_QUOTA_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
member.summary: The user's cloud storage quota is filled.

member.name: SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS.SESF_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR
member.summary: The user's account credentials are invalid.

member.name: SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS.SESF_PAUSED_DUE_TO_METERED_NETWORK
member.summary: The sync engine is paused because of metered network settings.

member.name: SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS.SESF_PAUSED_DUE_TO_DISK_SPACE_FULL
member.summary: The drive that contains the sync engine's content has reached the maximum allowed space.

member.name: SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS.SESF_PAUSED_DUE_TO_CLIENT_POLICY
member.summary: The user has exceeded their daily limit of requests or data transfers to the service.

member.name: SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS.SESF_PAUSED_DUE_TO_SERVICE_POLICY
member.summary: The service has requested the system to throttle requests.

member.name: SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS.SESF_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE
member.summary: The service can't be reached at this time.

member.name: SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS.SESF_ALL_FLAGS
member.summary: A bitmask value for all valid SYNC_ENGINE_STATE_FLAGS flags.
